meanings.definition: Having a cover made of flexible material.
meanings.sent1: The softbound notebook easily bent in my bag.
meanings.sent2: I prefer softbound books because they are easier to carry around.
meanings.sent3: The softbound journal danced in the wind, looking like a leaf.
meanings.sent4: Her softbound heart was easily swayed by kind words.
meanings.sent5: The softbound cover felt like a gentle hug around the book.

meanings.definition: A book with a flexible cover.
meanings.sent1: I bought a softbound for my summer reading list.
meanings.sent2: The library had a great selection of softbound books.
meanings.sent3: The softbound on the shelf winked at me, begging to be read.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were a softbound of memories, easily flipped through.
meanings.sent5: The softbound held within it a world of imagination and adventure.
